duration_raw: until the end of your target's next turn
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">[Commanding Lash](/Spells.aspx?ID=408)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Incapacitation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=93" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 390 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Tyranny](/Domains.aspx?ID=33)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

**Requirements** Your most recent action dealt damage to a target
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 100 feet

**Target** A creature you dealt damage to on your most recent action.
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** Will

**Duration** until the end of your target's next turn
</row>

</column>

---

With the threat of more pain, you compel a creature you've recently harmed. You issue a command to the target, with the effects of the spell [_command_](/Spells.aspx?ID=45).
name: Commanding Lash
requirement: Your most recent action dealt damage to a target
